Achieve a better night sleep

Low price guarantee

Pressure relief

Ergonomically contured therapeutic wave shape pillow developed by orthopedic doctors ensures proper spine alignment support and comfort.

A natural sleep experience awaits

We're smartic, a group of folks on a mission to maximize your comfort and sleep. Our flagship product is the smartic Pillow, the first (and still only) pillow custom-built-to-order based on your unique sleep profile. Since then, we've expanded with the guiding principles of offering quality, crazy-comfy products, and customer care so good you'd invite us to your birthday. View More

Head and neck support

Has down-like softness while still providing support and firmness to neck and shoulders, reduce neck pain

Improved sleep quality

The Wife Pillow's ergonomic design helps to provide a more comfortable and restful sleep experience. Its contoured shape helps to reduce nerve impingement and alleviate common problems such as numbness and pain, leading to a better night's sleep.

Reduced pain and discomfort

The Wife Pillow is designed to help reduce nerve impingement and provide optimal support to the natural curvature of the neck and spine, alleviating pressure points that cause pain.

Adjustable height for perfect alignment

For users who experience difficulty finding a comfortable sleeping position, the Wife Pillow may help guide your head, shoulders and body into your personal neutral position

Arm-Positioning

Allows your arm to pass perfectly through the pillow. No more waking with numb arms and shoulders.

All sleepers: Side sleepers, back sleepers, hip sleepers

The Wife Pillow’s versatility and comfort make it a must-have for anyone looking to improve their sleep quality and overall health.

Inner shell zippers allow complete adjustability

The Wife Pillow is designed with 4 zippered pillars on the shell, enabling you to add and remove filling as needed for ultimate comfort wherever you need it most.We provide additional filling, if requested, free of charge.

Our favorite new collections

Upgrade your sleep quality

Achieve maximum comfort while you sleep on your stomach with our ergonomic belly sleeper pillow. Ergonomic design & pain relief sleeping

Higher or lower support? side or back sleeping? two heights and two sides accomodate your different needs.
